mapper.select:
SELECT a.id, a.logo, a.`name`, a.trade_type AS tradeType, a.product_label AS productLabel, a.tech_label AS techLabel, a.type, a.scope_business AS scopeBusiness, a.area_name AS areaName, a.province_name AS provinceName, a.city_name AS cityName
FROM t_company AS a WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchFiled},'%')
AND a.trade_type = #{tradeType}
AND a.type = #{type}
AND (a.province_id = #{addrId} OR a.city_id = #{addrId} OR a.area_id = #{addrId})
ORDER BY a.create_at DESC
